txt.en: 'Are you looking to be welcomed into the inner circle of the Mathom Society? I can help you with that and make you \qKindred\q with the Mathom Society.\n\n'If this sounds good to you, speak to me again!'
'Alright, soon you will be Kindred with the Mathom Society. Ready?'
By completing this quest, you will be considered Kindred with the Mathom Society.
